releaseNotes:
- Refactored update dialog with architecture-specific APK support and seamless in-app install.

- Resolved TV UI overflows, improved remote navigation, and fixed mobile RangeError and many more...

Team Netra

changelog.text: Refactored update dialog with architecture-specific APK support and seamless in-app install.
Add floating action button to switch providers on Home Screen.
Implement pagination and instant history updates.
Resolved TV UI overflows, improved remote navigation, and fixed mobile RangeError.
Improved focus management and visual feedback across all TV screens.
Fix Xiaomi/MediaTek playback crash by switching to TextureView.

lockMessage: The app is temporarily locked for maintenance. Please check back later.
